column5: After getting skunked on the weekend I thought I would try my luck again.  Me and two other friends headed out of Guelph at 5:30am.  On the water by 8:30am.  The conditions were perfect. I boated two fish and missed another two.  My bud landed one and lost another monster. All fish were caught before 12:00pm.  It seemed as if when the sun came out the musky shut down.  This is my buddy's 1st.  He was really happy.  The fish he lost started jumping like crazy and spit the lure.  He was ticked.  I was laughing. lol.  Enjoy.
Right on Man!! Glad to see you got into them. I told you they were there on saturday......just had lock jaw.  Keep atter, and you'll get lots more, and bigger ones too!  Sinker
Congrats on the nice skis. I love the sky in the first two pics
awesome few fish.  that one looks really long!  Cheers!
Nice report and pics!!!  Looks like you're gettin' the hang of those Mucksies!!!
Nice job, that last one is a beauty.  Congrats to your buddy too on his first.  Thanks for the report.
Nice long musky! That looks at least 46 inches!!Thanks for sharing!
She was 42 inches.  My biggest so far.  I was smiling for the rest of the day.  Now I want a 50.
Nice fish, way to go.  Looks like it was a great "ski" day  Joey
Good luck with the 50"er. If you catch it with me in my boat..........I hope you can swim!!!!  Sinker
It wouldn't be the 1st time I went swimming from your boat.  Maybe you should get some goggles so I can save your lure.
I really wish I would have taken a pic of that......LOL
